CustodyItem.name: CustodyItem
CustodyItem.description: Represents information about an item in the custody chain.

Category.description: Specifies the category of the item that's in custody.

CollectionDateTime.description: The date and time when the custody item was collected.

Description.description: The description of the item that's in custody.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier for the custody item or the custody chain.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: The name of the item that's in custody.

ReferenceItemObjectApiName.description: The API name of the reference object that stores the record of the item that's in custody. For internal use only.

ReferenceItemRecordId.description: The API name of the reference object that stores the record of the item that's in custody.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the item that's in custody. Picklist values aren't predefined for this field. Before you create a record, ensure that your Salesforce admin has defined picklist values based on your organizationâ€™s requirement.
